alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 2:57PM MDT until April 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MONDAY TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY ABOVE 10000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 10000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. * WHEN...From 3 PM Monday to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
